channel.title: Help with my Compiler
channel.description:
[b]Okay, I've started my own 508 source with help from Ploxagescape's owner - Mike, And I've came to the stage that I'm going to release it to the public. But I'm trying to compile it for the updates and this happens;[/b]
[code]Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
[code]@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause[/code]
[b]Can you please help me, I'm so desperate - The person who helps me, I will consider giving them Co-owner status on my server and ask Mike to give them Admin on his server.[/b]
[b]Thank you for your time.[/b]
~Pure wc1994 X

item.title: Help with my Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Guthix_Rule Guthix Rule
item.description:
@Guthix_Rule wrote:

Oh i was testing you

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my Compiler
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

[quote=“zerogordo, post:4, topic:235982”][quote author=pure wc1994 link=topic=311282.msg2482971#msg2482971 date=1223660640]

ok first of all you should use the compiler that came with it and just edit that first compiler (use the all.bat) and put in jdk1.6.0_07 instead of whats there if you have jdk6u7 the reason this isnt working is because the java files are inside the folders within the folders (src/palidino76/) because you have nothing to compile so it should look like this is an example

@echo off
cd ../src
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java
pause

There ya go ;D

I’ve done all that but. Now it just takes ages then does Press any key to continue . . . and doesn’t compile.
[/quote]

thats what its suppose to say lol[/quote]

Retard

Guthix Rule:

Why dont you just use a normal compiler?

The server is packaged, so it needs all of that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Guthix_Rule Guthix Rule
item.description:
@Guthix_Rule wrote:

Why dont you just use a normal compiler?

item.title: Help with my Compiler
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“pure wc1994, post:3, topic:235982”][quote author=zerogordo link=topic=311282.msg2482894#msg2482894 date=1223656605]
ok first of all you should use the compiler that came with it and just edit that first compiler (use the all.bat) and put in jdk1.6.0_07 instead of whats there if you have jdk6u7 the reason this isnt working is because the java files are inside the folders within the folders (src/palidino76/) because you have nothing to compile so it should look like this is an example

@echo off
cd ../src
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java
pause

There ya go ;D
[/quote]
I’ve done all that but. Now it just takes ages then does Press any key to continue . . . and doesn’t compile.[/quote]

thats what its suppose to say lol

item.title: Help with my Compiler
item.dc:creator: @pure_wc1994 pure wc1994
item.description:
@pure_wc1994 wrote:

[quote=“zerogordo, post:2, topic:235982”]ok first of all you should use the compiler that came with it and just edit that first compiler (use the all.bat) and put in jdk1.6.0_07 instead of whats there if you have jdk6u7 the reason this isnt working is because the java files are inside the folders within the folders (src/palidino76/) because you have nothing to compile so it should look like this is an example

@echo off
cd ../src
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java
pause

There ya go ;D[/quote]
I’ve done all that but. Now it just takes ages then does Press any key to continue . . . and doesn’t compile.

item.title: Help with my Compiler

item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

ok first of all you should use the compiler that came with it and just edit that first compiler (use the all.bat) and put in jdk1.6.0_07 instead of whats there if you have jdk6u7 the reason this isnt working is because the java files are inside the folders within the folders (src/palidino76/) because you have nothing to compile so it should look like this is an example

@echo off
cd ../src
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java

There ya go ;D

item.title: Help with my Compiler
item.dc:creator: @pure_wc1994 pure wc1994
item.description:
@pure_wc1994 wrote:

Okay, I’ve started my own 508 source with help from Ploxagescape’s owner - Mike, And I’ve came to the stage that I’m going to release it to the public. But I’m trying to compile it for the updates and this happens;

Press any key to continue . . .

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause

Can you please help me, I’m so desperate - The person who helps me, I will consider giving them Co-owner status on my server and ask Mike to give them Admin on his server.

Thank you for your time.

~Pure wc1994 X
